boolean.description: Binarize levelset and write as byte mask, rather than write floating-point levelset function itself.
boolean.name: binarize
boolean.label: binarize

parameters.label: Levelset Initialization
parameters.description: These parameters control the initialization of the levelset function

double.description: Scale factor to reduce or increase the size of the initial foreground region sphere.
double.name: scale_initial_sphere
double.label: scale_initial_sphere

parameters.label: Levelset Evolution Parameters
parameters.description: These parameters control the evolution of the levelset function

boolean.description: Force given number of iterations, even when convergence has been detected
boolean.name: force_iterations
boolean.label: force_iterations

double.description: Gaussian filter sigma in world coordinate units (e.g., mm)
double.name: filter_sigma
double.label: filter_sigma

double.description: Time constant for levelset evolution; must be > 0; larger is faster
double.name: delta
double.label: delta

double.description: Levelset threshold: levelset function is truncated at +/- this value
double.name: levelset_threshold
double.label: levelset_threshold

string.description: Path to image/transformation database that should be updated with the newly created image.
string.name: db
string.label: db
